subsection_name: gian-tinh-mach-thung-tinh.json_6_Can you have children with varicocele?
subsection_content:
About 1 in 10 men have a varicocele. However, many people with varicocele do not have abnormalities in sperm count or fertility problems.(3)
However, 40% of men are infertile due to varicocele.
The reason is shown, when the spermatic plexus dilates, causing blood stasis and increasing the temperature in the testicles. This leads to the destruction of the man's sperm.

About 1 in 10 men have a varicocele. However, many people with varicocele do not have abnormalities in sperm count or fertility problems.(3)
However, 40% of men are infertile due to varicocele.
The reason is shown, when the spermatic plexus dilates, causing blood stasis and increasing the temperature in the testicles. This leads to the destruction of the man's sperm.
